title: Kinda stuck..
body:
Ok so I've been in Diamond 5 for basically all of season 4 with maybe 1 or 2 climbs to Diamond 4 before falling back again. Kinda getting frustrating. I'm looking to improve and to move on up into high diamond/master/challenger in season 5 but as much as I try I really don't know what I'm not doing well enough/what I'm not doing at all. Now I know I'm going to get responses saying 'Focus on your last hitting/trading/grouping/calling', I know this. I am trying to every single game. I'm hoping there is like legit 1 thing I'm not doing at all that I can start doing that will help me climb even though that's probably not it haha.

TLDR: Stuck in D5. Not sure what to improve on/how to get any higher. Pls halp. Oh and I'm an ADC main

Try Duoing with a good sup might help

if you wouldn't mind, could you go to op.gg and start recording your games. I'll review them and offer what i think could help.



1. how do you handle defeat? 
2. how do you handle success?
3. do you feel you tilt easy? Rage etc..

the reason i ask these questions is, if its not a mechanical/skill issue then attitude is next in line.



also

the one recent game you had ( a malphite game) available to spectate, i noticed the last team fight was abit.... forced. team was split, and your engage wasn't on the backline.


Really would like to help :)



For Professional Help

1. I'd recommend you get about 10 match replays saved and send them into https://www.youtube.com/user/foxdropLoL
he quite enjoys doing analysis on replays, as long you don't have a problem the replay being used in his videos..

2. I'd also recommend getting in touch with some of the ADC challenger players if able. ask for some suggestions or touch base on any questions you may have which are bugging you.
